enchantment.vanillatweaks.nimble.desc: Each level adds a bit to your movement speed.
enchantment.vanillatweaks.hops.desc: Each level adds a bit to your jump height.
enchantment.vanillatweaks.vigor.desc: Grants the wearer a one heart max health increase per level.
enchantment.vanillatweaks.veteran.desc: Attract all experience orbs in a 32-block radius towards you.
enchantment.vanillatweaks.blazing.desc: Automatically smelts everything the block drops.
enchantment.vanillatweaks.siphon.desc: All mined block drops instantly go into your inventory.
enchantment.vanillatweaks.homing.desc: Your arrows will aim right at your target.
